title: Half-Smiling Exercises
introText: Take your time with these calming exercises to build emotional awareness and expand your ability to identify and name feelings with kindness toward yourself.

exercises.title: Mindful Half-Smile Practice
exercises.description: Spend five minutes practicing Half-Smile each morning. Pair with calming visualization like imagining peaceful place or soothing color washing over you.

exercises.title: Emotion Mapping
exercises.description: Write down recent situation where you felt overwhelmed. Reflect on whether using Half-Smile could have helped. Plan how to incorporate it into similar future situations.

exercises.title: Half-Smile in Action
exercises.description: Select specific daily activity (washing dishes, walking to class) and incorporate Half-Smile during that time. Notice how it shifts your focus or emotional state.

exercises.title: Anchor Prompts
exercises.description: Create list of affirmations or intentions to pair with Half-Smile: 'I am grounded,' 'This is temporary,' 'I can navigate this.' Use these when practicing the skill.

exercises.title: Be Patient With Yourself
exercises.description: The more you patiently practice identifying emotions, the better you'll become at understanding and managing them with compassion.
